Provides access to the object pointed to by the pointer-like object {{c|*this}} wraps.

The behavior of these functions is undefined if {{c|get() {{==}} nullptr}}.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
@1,2@ The object pointed to by the wrapped pointer-like object, i.e., {{c|*get()}}.

@3,4@ A pointer to the object pointed to by the wrapped pointer-like object, i.e., {{c|get()}}.
